    hand - Variable in class sysobj.Player

    HAND_EMPTY - Static variable in class system.Const
    Represents an empty hand.
    handleCardActions(Card) - Method in class system.GameController
    Some cards have special cases, and this method determines which of their special functions should be executed based on the rank of the card.
    handleCardDraw() - Method in class system.GameController
    Handles the drawing of a card.
    handleCardPlay(Card) - Method in class system.GameController

    handleClientDraw(String) - Method in class system.GameController
    Handles when a client draws a card.
    handleClientPostSuitChoice(Card, Suit) - Method in class system.GameController
    Logic that picks up after a client has picked a suit for an eight.
    handleEight() - Method in class system.GameController
    Handles when an eight is played.
    handleForcedDraw(int) - Method in class system.GameController
    When a player is forced to draw cards by some effect, their hand must be refreshed to reflect the drawn cards.
    handleStartRound() - Method in class system.GameController
    Handles a new round starting.
    hasLegalMove(Card) - Method in class sysobj.Player
    Determines if the player has any legal moves based on the status of the last played card.
